nodes.text: Barely Tolerable: Alien Henchmen of the Empire

Barely Tolerable: Alien Henchmen of the Empire is a three-part series of reference articles featured on the StarWars.com blogs. Written by Abel G. Peña and Rich Handley, it is in the line of the Aliens in the Empire article that was written as an online supplement to Star Wars Insider 96 and 97. Part 1 was released on August 8, 2013, Part 2 was released on August 22, 2013 and Part 3 was released on September 12, 2013.

It is also particularly notable as being the first source to briefly reference the events of Perfect Evil, a manga that had been previously been listed under the Infinities label, regarding the character KkH'Oar'Rrhr.
